sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STRETCHING, in navigation, is generally underſtood to imply the progreſſion of a ſhip under a great ſurface of sail, when cloſe-hauled. The difference between this term and st anding, conſiſts apparently in the quantity of sail ; which in the latter may be very moderate ; but ſtretching generally ſignifies exceſs : as, we ſaw the enemy at day break ſtretching to the ſouthward under a croud of ſail, &c. Falconer.
